comment: Mr. Altizer provides new freshmen a class to adapt to the upcoming perils of college. Via KSU's own book covering what to expect as a freshmen, he provides presentations (most with guest speakers). Interaction with other students is a major part of this class and can be a bit frustrating when you're grouped with slackers. In conclusion, he's a ok.

Andrew is a very easy going and cut up type of guy. The work is very minimal; If you don't get an "A" you don't have a pulse. Class usually gets out really early. TAKE HIM!!! Also, he loves to talk about Georgia tech and his personal life. Nice guy!
I think he worked at  Georgia Tech?
He's very funny, wants you to pass, cares about how you do your Freshman year, and all tests, quizzes and projects are easy. Great professor. Just don't miss 6+ classes.
